name: Import Export For WooCommerce
author: Siddharth Nagar

sections.description:
Introduction

Import Export for WooCommerce is an easy yet extremely useful plugin for both new and advanced users who want to Import / Export data into/from their website.
The plugin facilitates:
Products Import Export for WooCommerce
Product Categories Import Export for WooCommerce
Reviews Import Export for WooCommerce
Orders Import Export for WooCommerce
Coupons Import Export for WooCommerce
Users Import Export for WooCommerce
in just a single click.
Recommended for its quality features like ease-of-use and reliability, this plugin also offers advanced features like filters, standard and custom field mapping, scheduling, log view/download, etc. to convert all these activities into a smooth experience.

FEATURES

General

🔸 Easy Installation and Detailed Documentation
🔸 Easy to use interface
🔸 AJAX Import/Export process
🔸 Export data to CSV
🔸 Import data from CSV
🔸 Fully responsive and customizable
🔸 Dedicated support

Products Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 All product types supported
🔸 Custom attributes supported
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import products by URL

Product Categories Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import categories by URL

Product Reviews Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import categories by URL

Orders Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 All order statuses supported including custom status
🔸 Custom attributes supported
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import orders by URL

Users Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 All user roles supported including custom roles
🔸 Custom capabilities supported
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import users by URL

Coupons Import Export

🔸 Multiple Export Filters
🔸 Custom fields supported
🔸 Multiple field mapping profiles available
🔸 Multiple scheduling profiles available
🔸 Schedule Import/Export (Automatic Import/Export)
🔸 Import coupons by URL

FREE FEATURES

🔸 Products Export
🔸 Products Import
🔸 Product Categories Export
🔸 Product Reviews Export
🔸 Orders Export
🔸 Users Export
🔸 Coupons Export

PREMIUM PLUGIN

✅ Import Products, Product Categories, Product Reviews, Orders, Users & Coupons
✅ Export Products, Product Categories, Product Reviews, Orders, Users & Coupons
✅ Create Mapping Profiles for Import & Export process
✅ Create Scheduling Profiles for Import & Export process
✅ View logs for Import & Export
✅ Manage settings of Import & Export process

Download the premium version of the plugin here

DOWNLOAD

  • Sample CSV of Products Export
  • Sample CSV of Product Categories Export
  • Sample CSV of Product Reviews Export
  • Sample CSV of Orders Export
  • Sample CSV of Users Export
  • Sample CSV of Coupons Export

DOCUMENTATION & DEMO

View the documentation and demo of the plugin here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin support product images import/export?

Yes. You can import/export product images import/export.

Does this plugin supports variable, variation products?

Yes. You can import/export all types of products (simple, variable, variation, external, grouped)

Does this plugin allows to import the file from a URL?

Yes. You can import the file from a URL.

Is the plugin customizable?

Yes. We have added hooks at each point. You can also add custom hooks and use them to add your custom code.
sections.changelog:
1.5

  • Mapping Profile bug resolved.
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.4.1 and WooCommerce 8.2.2.

1.4.5

  • PHP active session bug resolved.

1.4.4

  • Product export bug fixes.

1.4.3

  • Bug fixes.

1.4.2

  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.0.1 and WooCommerce 6.7.0.
  • Error handling while the import or export process is terminated due to error.

1.4.1

  • Product description invalid characters in the import module.

1.4

  • Product Categories Export included in the Basic version
  • Product Reviews Export included in the Basic version
  • Orders Export included in the Basic version
  • Users Export included in the Basic version
  • Coupons Export included in the Basic version

1.3.2

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.9 and WooCommerce 6.1.1.

1.3.1

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.8 and WooCommerce 5.5.

1.3.0

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.7 and WooCommerce 5.1.
  • Bug Fix. Special UTF character removed from CSV while import.

1.2.0

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.6 and WooCommerce 4.9.
  • Bug Fix. Variation gallery images were not uploading.
  • Bug Fix. New product categories were not creating in import.

1.0.2

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.5.1 and WooCommerce 4.5.1.

1.0.1

  • Bug Fix. Manage Stock values was setting to true if not provided in the CSV.

1.0.0

Initial release.

sections.reviews:
Great plugin for import coupon

By securese34 on November 8, 2023

I use for import a lot of coupon on my website

very bad!

By storix on December 7, 2021

This is a premium plugin but the photos say something else!

Completly unusefull

By mkdesopole on October 23, 2021

Completly unusefull. Every option is PRO.

Plugin Doesn't Mention it Must Be Purchased

By MoonDog on October 1, 2021

I downloaded this thinking it might be a good option to import-export data from my Woocommerce store, only to discover that a Pro version must be purchased to do anything. Why wasn't that mentioned anywhere on the plugin synopsis page? I don't like deceptive plugin developers.

Great Support and super plugin

By remobi on May 11, 2021

My server is not the best, which of course caused performance problems. Nevertheless, the support responded immediately and fixed the problem. The consistently very good ratings are 100% justified.

Muy buen complemento y fantástica la atención.

By InputCreativitySL on October 16, 2020

Es un plugin eficaz que te permite un montón de funcionalidades. He necesitado ayuda con la configuración y han sido rápidos y atentos. Lo recomiendo.

Superb..Very easy to use plugin

By abhinavsharma on October 9, 2020

Absolutely love this plugin, I tested it for few days and was so impressed that I purchased the pro plan. This plugin is a beast and solves all your data import export worries for woocommerce in few clicks. Thanks for developing this!

Amazing Import-Export Wordpress Plugin For Woocommerce

By charlottelancaster on October 6, 2020

I at last found solution for my ultimate issue of import-export which works perfectly with woocommerce plugin! Thank you so much for this, simple plugin with great support. Techs are very friendly and available 7 days a week.

Does exactly what it says

By gajjuthechamp on September 27, 2020

Made my life easy, I always had a problem with the importing my product to WooCommerce, not this plugin does the same which saves my time and give me the freedom modify my inventory as I like. Thanks

Very useful plugin

By dpowellchris on September 26, 2020

I have purchased the premium plugin and it is truly worth. I could use it easily and am really thankful to Siddharth for the support he provided. I would recommend it to everybody struggling with import export of products to woo commerce. Kudos to CodeTeam!!
